# selectedSpeed

**Instance Property**

The currently selected playback speed.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var selectedSpeed: AVPlaybackSpeed? { get }
```

## Discussion

This value reflects the associated player’s [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayer/defaultRate] property value. If you set the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayer/defaultRate] to a value that doesn’t match a speed contained in the [doc://com.apple.avkit/documentation/AVKit/AVPlayerView/speeds] property, the system sets this value to `nil`.

## Configuring the playback speed

- **speeds**: A list of user-selectable playback speeds to show in the playback speed control.
- **selectSpeed(_:)**: Selects a specified playback speed.
- **AVPlaybackSpeed**: An object that represents a user-selectable playback speed in a playback user interface.
